author: Unity
description:
📖 The official High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) e-book got a huge update for Unity 6. Now with 269 pages of new and revamped chapters to reflect all the HDRP-related features in Unity 6.1 

☁️🌊🌲 Are you ready to create breathtaking environments and ultra-realistic lighting for your next game? Learn how HDRP delivers physically accurate lighting, materials, and cinematic effects to make your scenes more immersive.

⭐Download the Unity 6 HDRP e-book:
https://unity.com/resources/lighting-environments-hdrp-unity-6 

Find all of Unity’s technical e-books plus more best practices here:
https://unity.com/how-to

Got feedback? Let us know in the Discussions thread: https://discussions.unity.com/t/new-technical-e-book-lighting-and-environments-in-the-hdrp-unity-6-edition/1677665
title: E-book available now: Lighting and environments in HDRP (Unity 6 edition)
